price: except those who are patient and do righteous deeds; it is they who will have forgiveness and a great reward.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna ṣabarū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīrun
